name: Mister Awesome
description:
An avatar of an awesome VR guy is destined to fight and always die alone against all crazy stuff that is going on a small meadow in the forest.

Survive as much as you only can and get diamonds for your survival time. In future updates, you will be able to get skill perks and buy new skins for diamonds. Game and music that you choose speed up and map gets bigger with time, so it gets more and more difficult to survive.

In the end, you will die anyway because A samurai has no goal, only path
